title: Hostel
content: Can somebody pls tell the options for hostel and the process for getting a room allotted

comments.body: So call the hostel Admission Staff, they will ask u for a date of appointment, that day u have to go physically to the campus, fill out the necessary details.
What are the options for accommodations(eg- 2 sharing )

For freshers 3 sharing ig, with attached bathroom-1.65L
and with common bathroom-1.5L

Bro there's no 2 sharing. It's only 4 and 6. All rooms are 4, but 1-2 rooms per floor have 6. God forbid you get 6 sharing cause that's horrible to share lmao. But see if their capacity is packed, you get put in a 4 sharing. So basically you and 3 other people. But if there are fewer people then if there is some room with only 2 people so far then you can get allotted in that so it's just you and 2 others so that's nice
